category.name: Maintenance.File Caching
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_Volume_FilesPerDir_Check_Interval
preference.preference_description: Specifies the interval (in seconds) at which the volume subdirectory should be checked for its maximum file limit. This option is only valid when the preference TC_Volume_Max_Files_Per_Dir is set to a value greater than 0. Very low values can affect the performance of the system. High values can affect the accuracy of TC_Volume_Max_Files_Per_Dir, so new sub-directories could get created much later than when the file limit has been reached.
